token.description: The OpsLevel API token to use for authentication.

aliases.description: A list of human-friendly, unique identifiers for the service

description.description: A brief description of the service.

framework.description: The primary software development framework that the service uses.

language.description: The primary programming language that the service is written in.

name.description: The display name of the service.

owner_id.description: The ID of the Team that owns this service.

product.description: A product is an application that your end user interacts with. Multiple services can work together to power a single product.

slug.description: Slug form of the service name. Also a valid service alias.

tags.description: A map of tags applied to the service

tier_id.description: The ID of the software tier that the service belongs to.

field.description: The service field to filter on. Accepts `alias`, `id`, `framework`, `language`, `ownerAlias`, `tag`.

value.description: The service field value to match.
